verses.verse: In those <S%H3117>days<s%> was <S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%> <S%H2470>sick<s%> and near <S%H4191>death.<s%> <S%H3470>Isaiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H531>Amoz,<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H559>him,<s%> and said to <S%H559>him,<s%> "Thus says <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H1004><s%> 'Set your house in <S%H6680>order,<s%> for you will <S%H4191>die,<s%> and not <S%H2421>live.<s%>'"
Then <S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%> <S%H5437>turned<s%> his <S%H6440>face<s%> to the <S%H7023>wall<s%> and <S%H6419>prayed<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%>

and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2142>"Remember<s%> <S%H3068>now,<s%> Yahweh, I <S%H577>beg<s%> <S%H1980>you,<s%> how I have walked <S%H6440>before<s%> you in <S%H571>truth<s%> and with a <S%H8003>perfect<s%> <S%H3820>heart,<s%> and have <S%H6213>done<s%> that which is <S%H2896>good<s%> in your <S%H5869>sight.<s%>" <S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%> <S%H1058>wept<s%> <S%H1419>bitterly.<s%>
Then the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> came to <S%H3470>Isaiah,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1980>"Go,<s%> and <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H2396>Hezekiah,<s%> <S%H559><s%> 'Thus says <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> your <S%H1>father,<s%> "I have <S%H8085>heard<s%> your <S%H8605>prayer.<s%> I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> your <S%H1832>tears.<s%> <S%H3254>Behold,<s%> I will add <S%H2568>fifteen<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> to your <S%H3117>life.<s%>
I will <S%H5337>deliver<s%> you and this <S%H5892>city<s%> out of the <S%H3709>hand<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria,<s%> and I will <S%H1598>defend<s%> this <S%H5892>city.<s%>
This shall be the <S%H226>sign<s%> to you from <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will <S%H6213>do<s%> this <S%H1697>thing<s%> that he has <S%H1696>spoken.<s%>

<S%H6738>Behold,<s%> I will cause the shadow on the <S%H4609>sundial,<s%> which has gone <S%H3381>down<s%> on <S%H8121>the<s%> <S%H4609>sundial<s%> of <S%H271>Ahaz<s%> with the <S%H7725>sun,<s%> to return <S%H322>backward<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H4609>steps.<s%> So the <S%H8121>sun<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H4609>steps<s%> on the sundial on <S%H4609>which<s%> it had gone <S%H3381>down.<s%>"'"
The <S%H4385>writing<s%> of <S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> when he had been <S%H2470>sick,<s%> and had <S%H2421>recovered<s%> of his <S%H2483>sickness.<s%>

I <S%H559>said,<s%> "In the <S%H1824>middle<s%> of my <S%H3117>life<s%> I <S%H3212>go<s%> into the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of <S%H7585>Sheol.<s%> I am <S%H6485>deprived<s%> of the <S%H3499>residue<s%> of my <S%H8141>years.<s%>"

I <S%H559>said,<s%> "I <S%H7200>won't<s%> see <S%H3050>Yah,<s%> <S%H3050>Yah<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H2416>living.<s%> I will <S%H5027>see<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> no more with the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H2309>world.<s%>

My <S%H1755>dwelling<s%> is <S%H5265>removed,<s%> and is <S%H1540>carried<s%> away from me like a <S%H7473>shepherd<s%>'s <S%H168>tent.<s%> I have <S%H7088>rolled<s%> <S%H707>up,<s%> like a weaver, my <S%H2416>life.<s%> He will cut me <S%H1214>off<s%> from the <S%H1803>loom.<s%> From <S%H3117>day<s%> even to <S%H3915>night<s%> you will make an end of <S%H7999>me.<s%>

I waited <S%H7737>patiently<s%> until <S%H1242>morning.<s%> He <S%H7665>breaks<s%> all my <S%H6106>bones<s%> like a <S%H738>lion.<s%> From <S%H3117>day<s%> even to <S%H3915>night<s%> you will make an end of <S%H7999>me.<s%>

I <S%H6850>chattered<s%> like a <S%H5693>swallow<s%> or a <S%H5483>crane.<s%> I <S%H1897>moaned<s%> like a <S%H3123>dove.<s%> My <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H1809>weaken<s%> looking <S%H4791>upward.<s%> <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> I am <S%H6234>oppressed.<s%> Be my <S%H6148>security.<s%>"

What will I <S%H1696>say?<s%> He has both <S%H559>spoken<s%> to <S%H6213>me,<s%> and himself has done <S%H1718>it.<s%> I will walk carefully all my <S%H8141>years<s%> because of the <S%H4751>anguish<s%> of my <S%H5315>soul.<s%>
<S%H136>Lord,<s%> men <S%H2421>live<s%> by these <S%H7307>things;<s%> and my spirit finds <S%H2416>life<s%> in all of <S%H2492>them:<s%> you restore <S%H2421>me,<s%> and cause me to live.

<S%H7965>Behold,<s%> for peace I had great <S%H4751>anguish,<s%> but you have in <S%H2836>love<s%> for my <S%H5315>soul<s%> delivered it from the <S%H7845>pit<s%> of <S%H1097>corruption;<s%> for you have <S%H7993>cast<s%> all my <S%H2399>sins<s%> <S%H310>behind<s%> your <S%H1460>back.<s%>

For <S%H7585>Sheol<s%> <S%H3034>can't<s%> praise <S%H4194>you.<s%> Death <S%H1984>can't<s%> celebrate <S%H3381>you.<s%> Those who go down into the <S%H953>pit<s%> <S%H7663>can't<s%> hope for your <S%H571>truth.<s%>

The <S%H2416>living,<s%> the <S%H2416>living,<s%> he shall <S%H3034>praise<s%> <S%H3117>you,<s%> as I do this day. The <S%H1>father<s%> shall make <S%H3045>known<s%> your <S%H571>truth<s%> to the <S%H1121>children.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will <S%H3467>save<s%> <S%H5058>me.<s%> Therefore we will sing my songs with stringed <S%H5059>instruments<s%> all the <S%H3117>days<s%> of our <S%H2416>life<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

Now <S%H3470>Isaiah<s%> had <S%H559>said,<s%> "Let them <S%H5375>take<s%> a <S%H1690>cake<s%> of <S%H8384>figs,<s%> and lay it for a <S%H4799>poultice<s%> on the <S%H7822>boil,<s%> and he shall <S%H2421>recover.<s%>"
<S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%> also had <S%H559>said,<s%> "What is the <S%H226>sign<s%> that I will go <S%H5927>up<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh?<s%>"
